Tile.Description: The radial menu control displays a hierarchical menu structure in a radial layout optimized for usage on touch devices. It is typically used as a context menu and can expose more menu items in the same space than a traditional menu control.
Busy indicator control includes over 30 pre-built animations that can be shown within your applications.
Color picker control exposes color selection through a touch friendly interface. All settings including the RGB values can be manipulated purely using touch.
Date/time picker control provides an easy to use interface for quickly selecting a date/time on touch devices.

HubTile is a ContentControl that makes it possible to display live tiles within your application user interface. Content updates are shown through a variety of smooth animations similar to the live tile updates shown on the start screen of Windows 8.
Tree navigator control provides a unique interface that can expand a tree structure in-place without taking up more space on the screen.
Accordion control provides an interface where long list of items can be collapsed and one of more items can be expanded on demand. This is useful in dashboard views where space is a constraint.
The calendar control provides an interface similar to the built-in calendar for selecting a date or displaying events in a month view.

Carousel is an items control that arranges its items similar to the iTunes album cover browser interface. This layout is optimized for easily browsing a list of items on a touch device by swiping to reveal the next item.
Tab control is an ItemsControl that displays its items in a tab structure enabling better space utilization within a page layout. Tabs can be positioned in Top, Bottom, Left or right positions.

The TileView control is an ItemsControl that displays one item in a maximized state and the rest in a minimized state. Each item can have a different data template for its minimized and maximized state. This control is very useful for building dashboards where one component of the dashboard needs to be analyzed in greater detail at a time.
